title: Case Study to Role of Large Language Models in Prediction of the Future Illness
details: H Thakar, V Pradhan, J Sarda, B Brahma, AK Bhoi - Enabling Person-Centric …, 2025
abstract: Abstract Large Language Models (LLMs) have emerged as transformative tools in healthcare, offering unprecedented capabilities in data analysis and predictive modeling. This paper investigates the application of LLMs in predicting future …
